item.title: Fridge freezer flytipped by Electricity sub station by side of Candy Box Maple Crescent, 10th January
item.description:
A large fridge freezer has been dumped on the footway at the side of the Candy Box by the Electricity sub station overnight. Please can this be removed as soon as possible due to harmful CFC gasses present and it being a trip hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Maple Crescent, Blackfen, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Christmas Trees Need collecting, 10th January
item.description:
The street is littered with Christmas trees that have sat there for nearly a week. It‚Äôs now encouraging others to litter and fly tip in the same area, so needs dealing with asap and Truman‚Äôs Road needs cleaning too as litter strewn everywhere.

item.title: Dumped household rubbish and Christmas trees, 10th January
item.description:
Rubbish, frequently dumped here, spills around the pavement. Strong winds, lift and shift heavy items, making this area potentially hazardous and unsafe for everyone. Entering and leaving Fellows Court feel unsafe too.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Weymouth Terrace, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole, after speedbump, 10th January
item.description:
